name: Swap Knights
description:
Play the role of one of the knights and fight for the heart of princess! Watch yourself and the running time, be careful of swapping place, color and time!

Game designed from scratch in 24 hours during Skillpoint Game Jam 2019, Wrocław.

Programming:
Wiktor Rott
Marta Rutkowska
Adam Szkolny

Models:
Klaudia Sagan

Animations:
Jakub Szwarga
